message: My internet keeps disconnecting every few minutes. It's incredibly frustrating!
I understand your frustration. Can you please tell me your account number?
Thank you. Please allow me a moment to review your account details.
Okay.
My bill is much higher than I expected this month. Can you explain why?
Certainly. I can help with that. Could you please provide your account number?
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your bill.
Great, thanks.
I'm having trouble logging into my account.
I'm sorry to hear that. Let's get that sorted. Can you confirm the email address associated with your account?
It's myemail@example.com
Thank you. Please try resetting your password using the 'Forgot Password' link.
I already tried that, and it's not working!
Hello! I just wanted to say your service is great!
Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We appreciate it!
Can I upgrade my internet speed?
Yes, absolutely! Let's see what options are available for your location. Account number, please?
My modem is flashing red. What does this mean?
A flashing red light usually indicates a connection issue. Let's troubleshoot. Is the power cord securely plugged in?
Yes, it is.
Okay. Have you tried restarting the modem?
Yes, multiple times!
I accidentally paid my bill twice. Can I get a refund?
Of course. I can help with that. Please provide your account number.
I'm moving next month. How do I transfer my service to my new address?
Congratulations on your move! I can help with that. Account number please?
I'm getting really slow speeds. I'm paying for 100mbps, but I'm only getting 10.
I understand. Let's run some tests. What's your account number?
Why is my bill always so confusing?
I apologize for the confusion. I can walk you through it. Account number?
I want to cancel my service.
I'm sorry to hear you're considering leaving. Could you share your account number and the reason for cancellation?
The internet is down again!
I'm very sorry to hear that. Let's check your connection. Account number?
I was charged a late fee, but I paid on time.
Let me investigate that for you. Can I have your account number, please?
I can't remember my password. Help!
No problem! Please go to the 'Forgot Password' link on our website.
Okay, thanks!
I would like to add a new user to my account.
Certainly, I can assist with that. Could you provide your account number?
